function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear data analysis process and methodology","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased results, misinformation","Mitigation":"Provide a clear and structured data analysis process, use multiple analytical methods, involve peer review","Technologies":"Data analysis software with built-in validation and peer review collaboration tools","People":"Analysts, researchers, and decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts, and peer reviewers"},{"Description":"Inadequate validation and triangulation of sources","Impact":"Unreliable and untrustworthy findings","Mitigation":"Triangulate sources, use multiple data sources, involve independent verification","Technologies":"Data validation tools, source verification software, data integration platforms","People":"Analysts, researchers, and decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts, and independent verifiers"},{"Description":"Risk of confirmation bias in data analysis","Impact":"Biased conclusions and interpretations","Mitigation":"Use diverse perspectives, involve independent review, challenge assumptions","Technologies":"Data analysis software with feature for bias detection, collaboration tools for diverse input","People":"Analysts, researchers, and decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts, and peer reviewers"}]}
